project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Overview and Scope Alignment
sections.goal: Confirm understanding of Orion Edge Gateway scope, objectives, and current build phase priorities.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the current scope of the Orion Edge Gateway and any changes since the initial charter?
What are the primary deliverables for this build phase, and how do they map to the SLA-ORI-02?
How have you ensured scope control given the evolving auth integration requirements?

sections.title: SLA and SLO Management
sections.goal: Assess how SLA-ORI-02 p95 latency targets are being planned for and measured.
sample_questions: What mechanisms are in place to monitor p95 latency in near real-time during the build phase?
How are you coordinating with the SRE team to ensure readiness for these SLAs?
Have you identified any risk areas that could jeopardize meeting the latency objectives?

sections.title: Integration with Security and IAM
sections.goal: Understand dependencies on Aegis IAM and Poseidon Networking for authentication and mTLS.
sample_questions: Can you describe the integration points between Orion Edge Gateway and Aegis IAM for SSO and RBAC?
How are mTLS handshake issues (e.g., GW-4821) being tracked and mitigated?
What is the fallback plan if Poseidon Networking changes its mTLS policy matrix mid-build?

sections.title: Risk Management and Contingency Planning
sections.goal: Explore the interviewee's approach to identifying, documenting, and mitigating risks.
sample_questions: What are your top three risks for this project and how are they documented?
Do you have any runbooks or RFCs that directly address these risks?
How do you balance risk aversion with delivery velocity in this build phase?

sections.title: Stakeholder Communication and Alignment
sections.goal: Evaluate how stakeholder expectations are managed and communicated.
sample_questions: How frequently are you updating stakeholders on SLA performance and integration status?
What tools or dashboards are you using to maintain transparency?
How do you handle conflicting priorities between Platform, Security, and Architecture teams?

sections.title: Post-Build Readiness
sections.goal: Assess preparations for the transition from build to operate phase.
sample_questions: What criteria will you use to declare readiness for production rollout?
Are there any gaps in runbook coverage, such as RB-GW-011, that could delay go-live?
How will you validate that all auth integration points meet compliance and security requirements?
